LanguageData.Bullet_Laser_NT.label: laser beam
LanguageData.Gun_LaserRifle_NT.label: Laser-Rifle
LanguageData.Gun_LaserRifle_NT.description: A basic energy-based laser gun that fires concentrated beams of light which pass through glass and thin metal.
LanguageData.Bullet_HeavyLaser_NT.label: heavy laser beam
LanguageData.Gun_LaserCannon_NT.label: Laser Cannon
LanguageData.Gun_LaserCannon_NT.description: A heavy-duty variant of the laser rifle, capable of dealing serious burn damage.
LanguageData.Bullet_Disabler_NT.label: disabler beam
LanguageData.Gun_EnergyGun_NT.label: Energy Gun
LanguageData.Gun_EnergyGun_NT.description: A specialized variant of a standard Laser Rifle, equipped with disabling shots as well as lethals.
LanguageData.Bullet_LesserLaser_NT.label: weak laser beam
LanguageData.Gun_RetroLaserRifle_NT.label: Retro Laser-Rifle
LanguageData.Gun_RetroLaserRifle_NT.description: An older model of the basic Laser Rifle, no longer used by Nanotrasen's private security or military forces. Nevertheless, it is still quite deadly and easy to maintain, making it a favorite amongst pirates and other outlaws.
LanguageData.Bullet_PulseLaser_NT.label: pulse beam
LanguageData.Gun_PulseRifle_NT.label: Pulse Rifle
LanguageData.Gun_PulseRifle_NT.description: A heavy-duty, super-charged laser rifle that fires devastating beams of concentrated death. It has three settings, all of them named 'DESTROY'.
LanguageData.Bullet_Buckshot_NT.label: weak bullet
LanguageData.Gun_CombatShotgun_NT.label: Combat Shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_CombatShotgun_NT.description: A specialized buckshot shotgun with a sleek black design, capable of delievering devastating blows on close-up targets.
LanguageData.Bullet_Regular_NT.label: bullet
LanguageData.Gun_SaberSMG_NT.label: Prototype Saber SMG
LanguageData.Gun_SaberSMG_NT.description: One of the few ballistic designs worked up by Nanotrasen's RnD team. Fires in 3-round bursts with decent range.
LanguageData.Bullet_Extinguish_NT.label: water-foam
LanguageData.Gun_Extinguisher_NT.label: Fire Extinguisher
LanguageData.Gun_Extinguisher_NT.description: A basic fire extinguisher, good for dousing fires and works as a decent weapon in a pinch.
LanguageData.Gun_Extinguisher_NT.tools.0.label: cannister
LanguageData.Gun_BananaPie_NT.label: awh fuck
LanguageData.Gun_BananaPie_NT.description: i cant believe you've done this
LanguageData.Gun_BananaPie_NT.tools.0.label: pie
LanguageData.Gun_Toolbox_NT.label: Toolbox
LanguageData.Gun_Toolbox_NT.description: A robust, metal toolbox full of construction tools. Good for the engineer on the move.
LanguageData.Gun_Toolbox_NT.tools.0.label: box
LanguageData.Bullet_Flammenwerfer_NT.label: flame
LanguageData.Gun_Flammenwerfer_NT.label: Improvised Flamethrower
LanguageData.Gun_Flammenwerfer_NT.description: An improvised flamethrower using a fuel line, a jerry can, and an igniter.
